title: Simulation-Based Design to Enhance Operational Flexibility in Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Process for professionals to experience and evaluate flexible design through simulation of real-world educational program operations

learning_goals: Learners can utilize a simulation tool to assess the operational flexibility of an educational program
Learners can analyze the impact of operational changes (e.g., lecture schedule adjustments, resource reallocation) on educational flexibility
Learners can develop an action plan for improving actual educational programs based on simulation results
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
